name: MEGA MAN ZERO 2 (Wii U)
description:
For the entire month of May, Nintendo and Capcom are celebrating our
favorite blue bomber, Mega Man, with six game releases on the Virtual
Console™ service for the Wii U™ system. Learn
more >

Zero must rejoin Ciel and the other Resistance fighters to stand a
chance against Neo Arcadia. But when a standing commander decides that
unsealing a dark, evil entity is the only option left, Zero will have to
equip every form of ability and weapon to turn the tides of war.

A year after separating from the Resistance, Zero arrives in the new
Resistance Base, where Commander Elpizo is now leading the fight against
Neo Arcadia. However, not all goes according to plan, and the threat of
awakening a legendary dark force foreshadows the start of a new war.
Zero can use basic abilities like jump, dash, and wall kick to traverse
stages while equipping different sub weapons for different attacks. But
he will also need to combine special items such as Cyber-elves, Forms,
and EX Skills to gain even stronger abilities and weapon upgrades. Zero
will need to use all within his power to stop this latest calamity
between humans and Reploids!
This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. We hope you'll enjoy the new features (including off-TV play) that have been added to this title. See more Virtual Console games for Wii U.
